post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Systems Analyst/Developer - Domino


  Systemaxx is a dynamic software solutions company. As an IBM premier business partner, we cater to multinational and medium size companies through our US and Canadian offices.
We are looking for a Lotus Domino Systems Analyst/Developer to augment our technical team. The candidate should have at least 2-4 years experience in Lotus Domino development and CLP certification. Other technical skills required: java and javascripts, systems design/analysis, development methodology, polished inter-personal skills, good written and oral communication.
We offer base+bonuses and an open opportunity to career advancement plus travel opportunities through our US offices.
For more info, please visit our web site at http://www.systemaxx.com


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: Smaxx-02  

Contact Information
admin@systemaxx.com
Systemaxx Consulting
220 Duncan Mill Road, Suite 210
Toronto ON M3B 3J5
Fax: 416-443-0036
post.title: Systems Analyst/Developer - Domino
